Text:
These have non-standard variable frame rate making them unplayable in most hardware media players. 

The will play however without problem on software players such as VLC.

To say they are NTSC standard is not absolutely true as NTSC standard is 30/1.001 (approximately 29.97) constant frames per second.
have a whinge why dont you just be greatful someone uploaded them. you can easily convert them to dvd

Never said I wasn't grateful and at least was polite which is more than I can say for jmanwf.

I was purely pointing out some problems I had for the benefit of others.

Part of the Internet is the exchange of information which imanwf obviously doesn't like. Perhaps he/she is anonymous out of hiding......
